%---  nice rts-file listings   ------------------------
\IfFileExists{listings.sty}{
\usepackage[savemem]{listings}
\lstdefinelanguage[]{rts}[]{C}{alsoother={_}}
\lstset{language=rts,extendedchars=true,columns=flexible,
  numbers=left,stepnumber=1,numberstyle=\tiny,firstnumber=1,
  breaklines=true,showstringspaces=false,basicstyle=\small\ttfamily,commentstyle=\small\ttfamily,
  prebreak=\mbox{\tiny$\hookleftarrow$},postbreak=\mbox{\tiny$\hookrightarrow$}}
}{}
%---  section numbering   ------------------------
\setcounter{tocdepth}{3}
\setcounter{secnumdepth}{3}

%%% \input{commands.tex}

%%% \definecolor{myblue}{rgb}{0.0,0.03,0.5}
\definecolor{myblue}{rgb}{0.0,0.0,1.0}

\newcommand{\com}[1]{\framebox
       {\parbox{\textwidth}{
           {\sf #1}
           }}}





\newcommand{\chg}[1]{\begin{tabular}{l|}
                      \parbox[t]{\textwidth}{ #1 } \\
                      \end{tabular}}

\newcommand{\percent}{\%}

\def\pict#1#2#3{
    \begin{figure}[htbp]
      \hfill\centerline{\includegraphics[width=\textwidth]{#2}}\hfill
      \caption{#1}\label{#3}
    \end{figure}
}


\def\pictsmall#1#2#3{
    \begin{figure}[htbp]
      \hfill\centerline{\includegraphics[width=5cm]{#2}}\hfill
      \caption{#1}\label{#3}
    \end{figure}
}

\def\pictmed#1#2#3{
    \begin{figure}[htbp]
      \hfill\centerline{\includegraphics[width=8cm]{#2}}\hfill
      \caption{#1}\label{#3}
    \end{figure}
}



% Verified's marginpar
\newcommand{\vmp}[1]{\marginpar{\raggedright{\textcolor{myblue}{\footnotesize\sf #1\normalsize}}}\ignorespaces}
